description: Returns details for a public registry.

parameters.name: nextToken
parameters.description: The nextToken value that's returned from a previous paginated DescribeRegistries request where maxResults was used and the results exceeded the value of that parameter. Pagination continues from the end of the previous results that returned the nextToken value. If there are no more results to return, this value is null.

nested_items.name: registries
nested_items.description: An object that contains the details for a public registry.

nested_items.name: registryId
nested_items.description: The Amazon Web Services account ID that's associated with the registry. If you do not specify a registry, the default public registry is assumed.

nested_items.name: registryArn
nested_items.description: The Amazon Resource Name (ARN) of the public registry.

nested_items.name: registryUri
nested_items.description: The URI of a public registry. The URI contains a universal prefix and the registry alias.

nested_items.name: verified
nested_items.description: Indicates whether the account is a verified Amazon Web Services Marketplace vendor. If an account is verified, each public repository receives a verified account badge on the Amazon ECR Public Gallery.

nested_items.name: aliases
nested_items.description: An array of objects that represents the aliases for a public registry.

nested_items.name: name
nested_items.description: The name of the registry alias.

nested_items.name: status
nested_items.description: The status of the registry alias.

nested_items.name: primaryRegistryAlias
nested_items.description: Indicates whether the registry alias is the primary alias for the registry. If true, the alias is the primary registry alias and is displayed in both the repository URL and the image URI used in the docker pull commands on the Amazon ECR Public Gallery.

nested_items.name: defaultRegistryAlias
nested_items.description: Indicates whether the registry alias is the default alias for the registry. When the first public repository is created, your public registry is assigned a default registry alias.

nested_items.name: nextToken
nested_items.description: The nextToken value to include in a future DescribeRepositories request. If the results of a DescribeRepositories request exceed maxResults, you can use this value to retrieve the next page of results. If there are no more results, this value is null.
